articles.content: Vegetables are full of vitamins and minerals and have lesser calories than meat or egg. However, they don’t contain as much protein per serving as meat. In addition, the proteins that they do contain… [+432 chars]

articles.title: Panel: Vaccinations will remain key to curbing COVID-19 in rural Minnesota - Mankato Free Press
articles.description: MANKATO — If COVID-19 takes on a seasonal pattern, vaccinations will be crucial long-term tools in preventing surges in rural areas, said medical experts during a panel discussion last week.
articles.content:
